title: The trust is a Community Foundation

slides.title: We Have Expertise
slides.body: in the areas we fund and make competitive grants directly to area nonprofits using revenue generated by our endowments.

slides.title: We Help Donors
slides.body: determine the best place for dollars to be granted to improve the community.

slides.title: We Manage
slides.body: both endowments and funds in which individuals maintain varying degrees of control.

slides.title: We Develop
slides.body: funding collaboratives with other foundations to meet broad community needs.

slides.title: We Partner
slides.body: with governments, corporations and other entities to develop new strategies to make systemic change.
